overview:
With over 4 years experience in Business Development, Recruitment and Event Management, Niamh has worked with a number of start-ups in industries ranging from construction and recruiting, to sustainable product design and digital media. Niamh ºs passion for innovation, problem solving and building trusted relationships transcends throughout each role, and she consistently manages to justify why technology is relevant, while implementing a unique digital strategy for each business.

Simultaneously, as New York ambassador for Sandbox Network, Niamh has been instrumental in the creation and championing of this global community, which incubates exceptional young innovators under 30 and now has 600+ young leaders worldwide. Niamh has planned 100+ events including intimate dinners with Fortune 500 executives, demo nights, weekend retreats for 80+ change-makers, and most recently the first annual Sandbox Global Summit which took place in January 2012 in Lisbon, Portugal.
